name: Bove
description:
---------------------------

Version 1.1.0

---------------------------

Bove is a puzzle game where you try to solve a way out of the level. To solve the level, you must move each block in a certain way to clear your path. You also must collect coins and find keys to get to the exit.

---------------------------

Controls
Move..............Arrow keys
Undo..............Z
Restart.........R
Action............X
Fullscreen....F11

---------------------------

CHANGELOG

v1.1.0
Key update, keys and locks. new key level added.

v1.0.2 - 5/14/2016
Bug fixes

v1.0.1 - 5/10/2016
Level 3 fixed[you are able to skip level]
